## AuthContainer.login() method

Login user with password.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
login(loginID: string, password: string, options?: {
        loginIDKey?: string;
    }): Promise<User>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  loginID | <code>string</code> | Login ID |
|  password | <code>string</code> | Password |
|  options | <code>{</code><br/><code>        loginIDKey?: string;</code><br/><code>    }</code> | Login options |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<User>`

## Example


```ts
// Login with email
await login("test\@example.com", "password");
// Login with username
await login("test", "password");

```
